transcript:
Customer: Waheguru Waheguru Waheguru\n
Hello?\n
Executive: Haanji sir Sandhya baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART ke office se senior manager.\n
Customer: Haanji madam.\n
Executive: Actually sir mujhe aapka ek mail receive hua tha ki aapko aapka mail ID block karana hai IndiaMART se.\n
Customer: Nahi nahi block nahi karana. Ye mere paas ye mail aaya hai ki aapka mail ID block ho gaya hai.\n
Executive: Block ho gaya?\n
Customer: Haan. Aap check kariye maine aapko bheja hai.\n
Executive: Ek second.\n
Customer: Maine parso mail bheja tha na?\n
Executive: Your message to customercare@indiamart.com has been blocked.\n
Customer: Ye mujhe mail aaya hai parso ki aapki email ID block kar di gayi hai.\n
Executive: Aapki email ID block nahi hui hai sir.\n
Customer: Fir? Your message to customercare@indiamart.com.\n
Customer: Maine maine parso mail bheja tha aapko.\n
Executive: To sir agar block hota to hamare paas mail nahi aata na. Mail to hamare ko kabhi bhi aaye.\n
Customer: Aap aapki baat thik hai yaar. Matlab maine isko dobara se aapko complaint bana ke send kiya to mere paas ticket open ho gaya. Magar ye mail ye mail parso aaya tha mere paas.\n
Executive: But sir parso bhi aapne ninth ko bhi aapne ticket dala hua tha to ninth wala ticket bhi hamare paas aaya tha. Aise kuch block nahi hua hoga wo kuch.\n
Customer: Aap screenshot dekhiye timing timing dekhiye na screenshot mein kis time aaya hua hai mere paas.\n
Executive: Wo maine check kar liya sir kuch technical problem ki wajah se aapke paas gaya hoga ye aise kuch problem nahi hai.\n
Customer: Kal kal bhi haan aur kal bhi ek wo issue aa raha tha jo maine aapko screenshot bheja tha ki mera IndiaMART do phone mein chalta hai.\n
Executive: Haan haan.\n
Customer: To ek ka data dusre mein aa hi nahi raha tha.\n
Executive: Aapne dono numbers jo hai wo aapne aapke hi number se unko login kar rakha hai dono phone mein?\n
Customer: Haan apne number se do kyuki do phone use karta hu na main ek calling pe rehta hai ek chatting pe rehta hai.\n
Executive: Shayad aapne dusra wala koi bhi ek phone ka na aapne usko update nahi kar raha hoga application ko aap update karo to ho jayega.\n
Customer: Nahi update kiya hai. Mere paas to auto update hai jaise hi wifi mein hota hai to auto update hota hai sara.\n
Customer: Aapka maine check nahi kiya magar ye to parso se issue ye parso parso ye issue tha thoda sa maine kaha ho jayega thik koi baat nahi.\n
Customer: To kal bhi ye issue raha hai.\n
Customer: Matlab update ho raha hai matlab late update ho raha hai late.\n
Executive: Update ho raha hai but late update ho raha hai na.\n
Customer: Haan kal jo maine check kiya thoda sa wo late ho raha hai. Magar magar maine magar maine aapko dono do screenshot bheje hain kal ek hi time pe ek hi customer ke alag alag phone se.\n
Executive: Haan haan.\n
Customer: Alag alag phone se aap time dekhiye. Customer ko maine parso maine usko uski koi inquiry thi fake buyer wagera to maine parso usko message bhej diya tha. Single star de diya sab kuch kar diya aur dusre phone mein update hi nahi hua.\n
Executive: Sir wo to thik hai wo to koi problem nahi hai jo aapka registered number hai us pe jyada activities hoti hongi. Secondary wale mein itna activity nahi ho paati hogi kyuki wo aapka registered.\n
Customer: Dono dono dono phone mein mere hi number hain.\n
Customer: Aisa hota hai kai baar main customer se baat kar raha hota hu to idhar dusra phone baj jata hai ya kisi ke message aa rahe hote hain chatting hum offline mein bhi to kaam kar rahe hain na kaafi.\n
Executive: Haan haan.\n
Customer: Online ke customer bhi aate hain ab jaise ab jaise IndiaMART ka IndiaMART wala hamara number hai wo ghar pe bhi bajta hai mere phone pe bhi ispe bhi bajta hai dusre phone pe bhi bajta hai ek aur phone hai us pe bhi bajta hai matlab teen char phoneo pe ikattha bajta hai wo.\n
Executive: Hmm.\n
Customer: Jab us pe customer ki call aati hai agar main busy hu to fir dusra koi utha leta hai.\n
Executive: Thik hai sir ye to thoda technically wala issue hai na to wo mujhe ek baar check karwana padega ki aapka ye problem.\n
Customer: Kal kal balki ek na customer ki miss call thi mere paas. Aur mere paas call nahi aaya dono number se.\n
Executive: Out of network to nahi tha sir number aapka?\n
Customer: Ek ek hoga dusra hoga. Tisra to nahi hoga ya chautha nahi hoga.\n
Customer: Bas khali mere mein message aaya miss call. Wo bhi IndiaMART ki us pe magar mere number pe calling nahi thi.\n
Executive: Wo to mujhe ek baar sir dekho sara chiz ek baar aapka na concern mujhe technical team ko hi dalna padega.\n
Customer: Ek baar software mein software mein dekhiye kuch kya hai. Kyuki ye ye issue pehle nahi tha ye issue abhi kal parso mein aaya hai ya to ya to koi update kiya hai inhone kuch kahi na kahi gadbad hui hai na.\n
Executive: Mere liye bhi to new hi hai na sir ye sara chize kyuki aaj tak kisi customer ne mujhe ye sab nahi bola hua hai.\n
Customer: Main wahi to bol raha hu na ki ye chiz parso humne update note kiya hai to ho sakta hai maybe shayad parso agar hum baat kare to Sunday ki Sunday ko agar update bhi hua ho to Monday Tuesday ko ye issue aaya ho.\n
Executive: Main samajh gayi aapki baat.\n
Executive: Thik hai wo main ek baar check karwa leti hu and agar aapka baki main abhi abhi setting check kar leta hu ki ek ki setting dusre pe abhi ab ja rahi hai ki nahi ja rahi hai.\n
Executive: Aap ek baar check kariye na sir over the call hi check kariye na ek baar aap.\n
Customer: Ek second madam.\n
Customer: Madam nahi aaya dusre pe.\n
Executive: Abhi bhi ye problem hai aap bol rahe ho.\n
Customer: Haan mujhe wahi issue lag raha hai.\n
Customer: Main iska ek baar software version check kar leta hu.\n
Customer: Last update 12 November aa raha hai madam.\n
Executive: Aap mujhe ek baar dono ka status bhejiye wo ek baar aap screenshot bhejiye mujhe dono phone ke.\n
Customer: Main abhi bhejta hu aapko.\n
Customer: Dono ka update dikha raha hai.\n
Customer: Main ise ek baar uninstall karke install karu jo secondary mera phone hai?\n
Executive: Haanji haan ek baar aap uninstall karke wapas se install kar lijiye but number jo aap enter karoge jisse aapka IndiaMART login hota hai wahi number aap enter kariyega na.\n
Customer: Wahi number se madam login karte hain hum to tabhi same aata hai na wo.\n
Executive: Tabhi aapka same chalega correct haanji. Aap dusre number se mat kariyega because fir wo aapka free mein aa jayega wo paid wale free mein nahi dikhte hain na.\n
Customer: Jo issue main bata raha hu na ye pehle kabhi nahi tha. Ye parso ya kal aaya hai.\n
Executive: Sir ye mujhe bhi 10 saal se pehli baar aa raha hai.\n
Customer: Haan ho sakta hai koi badi baat nahi hai.\n
Customer: Main ek baar check karke na aapko fir screenshot bhejta hu kaise hai kya hai.\n
Executive: Haan aur sir aapko\n
Customer: Hello?\n
Executive: Hello?\n
Executive: Hello?\n
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Email ID showing as blocked.

- Data not syncing between two phones.

- Missed call notification without actual call.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed email ID not blocked.

- Suggested uninstalling and reinstalling app on secondary phone.

- Asked customer to send screenshots of both phones.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send screenshots.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- app, sync, email, update, technical issue
